program ExitFun character*10 arg call getarg(1,arg) read(arg,*) istat write(6,'(a)') ' EXITFUN' call EXITFUN(istat) end

program EGSExitFun character*10 arg integer n_arg n_arg = iargc() if (n_arg.gt.0) then call getarg(1,arg) read(arg,*) istat else istat = 0 endif write(6,'(a)') ' EXITFUN' write(6,'(a)') char(13) call EXITFUN(istat) end

program SystemFun integer*4 i, istat, system character*30 command do i=1,len(command) command(i:i) = ' ' end do command = 'OUTSTRING' command(11:11) = char(0) istat = system(command) if( istat.ne.0 ) then write(6,'(a)') ' 1' else write(6,'(a)') ' 0' endif end
test.description: Does the "system" function return an exit status ?
